name: Ahmed Samir
bio: Ahmed is a certified personal trainer with 8 years of experience in strength training and nutrition coaching. He specializes in helping beginners build healthy habits and achieve long-term results.

faq.question: Do I need equipment to start training?
faq.answer: No, we can start with bodyweight workouts and build up from there.

faq.question: How many days per week should I train?
faq.answer: 4-5 days is optimal, but we can adjust based on your schedule.

faq.question: Do you provide a meal plan?
faq.answer: Yes, I offer customized meal plans tailored to your fitness goals.

name: Hady Mohamed
bio: Hady is a fitness coach who helps people improve flexibility, mental health, and overall wellness. He believes in a holistic approach to health.

faq.question: Can I lose weight with yoga only?
faq.answer: Yoga helps with weight management, especially when combined with a proper diet.

faq.question: Do you offer online sessions?
faq.answer: Yes, I provide online classes via Zoom.

faq.question: What should I wear for yoga sessions?
faq.answer: Comfortable, stretchy clothes that allow movement.

name: Mohamed Youssef
bio: Mohamed is a strength and conditioning coach with a background in sports science. He trains athletes and advanced lifters to improve performance.

faq.question: Can you help with powerlifting programs?
faq.answer: Yes, I design personalized programs for powerlifters.

faq.question: Do I need supplements?
faq.answer: Not always, but I can recommend if needed based on your nutrition.

name: Mohamed Hassan
bio: Mohamed is a certified Pilates and functional training instructor. She works with clients of all ages to improve mobility, strength, and core stability.

faq.question: Is Pilates good for back pain?
faq.answer: Yes, Pilates helps improve posture and relieve back pain.

faq.question: How long are your sessions?
faq.answer: Each session is 45-60 minutes depending on the program.

name: Khaled Nabil
bio: Khaled is a personal trainer and body transformation specialist. He focuses on fat loss, muscle building, and mindset coaching.

faq.question: Can I lose weight without cardio?
faq.answer: Yes, through strength training and proper diet, it's very possible.

faq.question: Do you provide transformation programs?
faq.answer: Yes, I offer 8 and 12-week transformation programs.

name: Tamer Ali
bio: Tamer specializes in HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) and functional fitness. He helps clients achieve fat loss and improve endurance with a combination of strength and cardio workouts.

faq.question: How do HIIT workouts work?
faq.answer: HIIT involves short bursts of intense exercise followed by short rest periods to maximize fat burning and improve cardiovascular health.

faq.question: Do I need to be in great shape to start?
faq.answer: No, HIIT can be modified to suit beginners and gradually increase in intensity as you progress.

name: Maher Ghanem
bio: Maher is a certified nutritionist and personal trainer who focuses on sustainable weight loss. She helps her clients develop healthy eating habits along with a personalized fitness plan.

faq.question: Can I lose weight without dieting?
faq.answer: Weight loss is generally a combination of healthy eating and exercise. I help my clients find a balanced approach.

name: Ahmed Fathy
bio: Ahmed is a strength coach and powerlifter, helping athletes maximize their performance in the gym. He focuses on personalized programs for improving strength and endurance.

faq.question: Do you train professional athletes?
faq.answer: Yes, I specialize in training athletes who aim to improve strength and powerlifting performance.

name: Fathy Hossam
bio: Fathy is a fitness coach who works with all ages to improve their body strength, flexibility, and mental clarity through Pilates and yoga.

faq.question: How often should I practice yoga?
faq.answer: I recommend practicing yoga 3-4 times a week for the best results.

name: Nader Maher
bio: Nader is a certified CrossFit trainer who helps clients achieve total body fitness. He focuses on high-intensity training to improve endurance, strength, and overall health.

faq.question: What is CrossFit?
faq.answer: CrossFit is a high-intensity workout that combines strength training, endurance, and cardio to provide full-body fitness.

name: Samer Saeed
bio: Samer is a certified yoga instructor and holistic health coach. She focuses on improving mental health, flexibility, and overall well-being through yoga and meditation.

faq.question: What are the benefits of yoga?
faq.answer: Yoga can help improve flexibility, relieve stress, and promote mental clarity.

name: Kareem Ashraf
bio: Kareem is a certified personal trainer who helps clients achieve their fitness goals through strength training, bodyweight exercises, and cardiovascular workouts.

faq.question: Can I get stronger without lifting heavy weights?
faq.answer: Yes, strength can be developed through bodyweight exercises, resistance bands, and lighter weights with higher repetitions.

name: Hassan Ibrahim
bio: Hassan is a CrossFit and Olympic weightlifting coach who trains athletes looking to enhance their power and agility for sports and competitive events.

faq.question: Is CrossFit suitable for beginners?
faq.answer: Yes, CrossFit can be scaled to suit all fitness levels, including beginners.

name: Mohand Adel
bio: Mohand is a certified nutrition and fitness coach. He helps people lose weight and build muscle with tailored fitness programs and nutrition plans.

faq.question: Do you offer custom meal plans?
faq.answer: Yes, I provide personalized meal plans designed to suit your fitness goals.

name: Reda Adel
bio: Reda is a CrossFit and Olympic weightlifting coach who trains athletes looking to enhance their power and agility for sports and competitive events.

faq.question: What type of music do you use in your classes?
faq.answer: I use upbeat and motivating music to keep the energy high and the mood fun.
